_sText:
This is the first map I've created for Counter-Strike Source. This is what I came up with after about 2 or so hours of tinkering with Hammer. Don't be afraid to give the map criticism; you won't hurt my feelings.

-------------------------------

Map: gg_aim_spider
Created by Strange Ranger

*** Installation ***
Extract folders to your cstrike folder, typically located at:
C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\Steamapps\(your steam name here)\Counter-Strike Source
- or -
C:\Program Files\Steam\Steamapps\(your steam name here)\Counter-Strike Source

*** History ***
1-26-08
- Released to public
